Chrome webstore version of the popular game, 2048!

A fun game that plays in a popup

This chrome extension allows you to play your favorite arcade game, anytime, anywhere! Just click on the 2048 icon in the top right corner of your browser, and start playing! If you loved 2048, you'll love this game.
